name: Hole Transform
description:
CONTROLS

If luck based gamemode selected: space to change shape randomly, ASDW to move

if no luck based then: Q and E to change shapes accordingly, ASDW to move

note: no luck based mode is harder

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

well, this is my entry for brackey's game jam 3, I'm pretty disappointed cause I could've done much better but I got tons of homeworks in school and they even decided to give me a goddamn project for this week so I only got to work for about 10 hours on this game... I hope you still kinda enjoy the game, thanks for checking it out.
